The claim was published on January 21: 2021, on a Facebook page called "Vocabulary and Dawn News' Informative Articles" with more than 50,000 followers.
The Facebook page: s profile picture is identical to the logo of major Pakistani English-language newspaper Dawn.
The claim is false: as a reverse image search revealed that the photo of Sukhera shared in the posts is from an army ceremony in 2016, and the PMC is led by a president, not a chairman. The current president of the commission is Dr Arshad Taqi, as stated on the PMC's website.
